FROM (
    SELECT e."Id", e."FirstName", e."LastName", e."Email", e."Phone", e."DateOfBirth", e."CitizenshipNumber", e."CreatedDate", e."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Employees" AS e
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName", a."EmployeesId", a."RolesId"
    FROM "AppRoleEmployee" AS a
    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EmployeesId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."EmployeesId", t0."RolesId"

SELECT t."Id", t."FirstName", t."LastName", t."Email", t."Phone", t."DateOfBirth", t."CitizenshipNumber", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."ConcurrencyStamp", t0."Name", t0."NormalizedName", t0."EmployeesId", t0."RolesId"
FROM (
    SELECT e."Id", e."FirstName", e."LastName", e."Email", e."Phone", e."DateOfBirth", e."CitizenshipNumber", e."CreatedDate", e."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Employees" AS e
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName", a."EmployeesId", a."RolesId"
    FROM "AppRoleEmployee" AS a
    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EmployeesId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."EmployeesId", t0."RolesId"

) AS t

) AS t

    SELECT a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName", a."EmployeesId", a."RolesId"

    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EmployeesId"

    INNER JOIN "Menus" AS m ON e."MenuId" = m."Id"

) AS t
